text: Ara yara ansi damra karaya tara bale -- allah yadi iccha karatena tabe amara tamke chere diye an'ya kono-kichu upasana karatama na, amara ba amadera pitrpurusara'o na, ebam amara tamke chere diye kono-kichu nisedha karatama na.â€™â€™ E'ibhabe'i tadera purbe yara chila tara'o acarana karata. Tabe rasulaganera upare suspastabhabe paumche de'oya chara an'ya kichu ache ki
